original_text: So this is what the Almighty Lord says: Listen! I have become the enemy of Pharaoh, king of Egypt. I will make him like a man with two broken arms. I will break his strong arm and his broken arm. He will not be able to fight at all! So this is what the Almighty Lord says: Listen! I have become the enemy of Pharaoh, king of Egypt. I will make him like a man with two broken arms. I will break his strong arm and his broken arm. He will not be able to fight at all!
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 내가 애굽의 바로 왕을 대적하여 그 두 팔 곧 성한 팔과 이미 꺾인 팔을 꺾어서 칼이 그 손에서 떨어지게 하고

sentences.original_text: So this is what the Almighty Lord says:
I have become the enemy of Pharaoh,
I will make him like a man
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그를 한 남자처럼 만들 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will break his strong arm
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그의 강한 팔을 부러뜨릴 것이며,
그리고 이미 부러진 그의 팔도 부러뜨릴 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will not be able to fight at all!
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 전혀 싸울 수 없을 것입니다!
